name: Personal Care and Assistance
description: Bathing, restroom activities, incontinence care, grooming, personal hygiene, dressing, walking, etc.

name: Meal Preparation and Diet Planning
description: Nutritious & delicious meals, diet planning (with dietary restrictions), feeding, etc.

name: Professional Medication Management
description: Reminders, supervision, pill box, organization, daily log, etc.

name: Transportation and Errands
description: Schedule planning and assistance (visits, appointments, errands, outings, etc.)

name: Companionship and Recreation
description: Conversation and entertainment (assistance with reading, games, crafts, puzzles, etc.)

name: Light Housekeeping
description: Home cleaning, laundry, linen changes, caring for pets, etc.
